trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.

trans-unit.source: Knights fight for honor and mercenaries fight for gold. The militia fights for hearth and home.

trans-unit.source: Giant Octopus
trans-unit.target: 巨章鱼

trans-unit.source: "Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair."\n—Jules Verne, *Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea*, trans. Lewis
trans-unit.target: 「在我眼前的可怕怪物，真是足以列入奇闻传说里面呢…脑袋上长的与其说是八只胳膊，倒不如说是八只脚…有它身躯的两倍长，像疯婆子的头发那样乱舞。」\n～朱尔·凡尔纳，《海底两万里》

trans-unit.source: Vizzerdrix

trans-unit.source: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made *that* mistake again.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于由他所操控的沼泽数量。（维持步骤是在重置之后、抓牌之前的时段。）
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Master Decoy
trans-unit.target: 诱敌专家

trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.
trans-unit.target: 技巧好的诱敌兵有办法让敌人跟丢。最顶尖的诱敌兵则还能确保自身安全以再显身手。

trans-unit.source: Her heart holds the pain of every soldier she's ever healed.

trans-unit.source: Noble Purpose
trans-unit.target: 崇高意志

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物造成战斗伤害时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.
trans-unit.target: 为正道而战这件事，便是其力量来源之一部份。

trans-unit.source: Peach Garden Oath
trans-unit.target: 桃园三结义

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·34 | Peach Garden Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个生物，便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "We three, though of separate ancestry, join in brotherhood. . . . We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die the selfsame day."\n—Peach Garden Oath
trans-unit.target: 「我们三人，虽然异姓，既然结为兄弟，…不求同年同月同日生，但愿同年同月同日死。」\n～第一回 宴桃园豪杰三结义

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

trans-unit.source: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

trans-unit.source: Sacred Ground
trans-unit.target: 圣洁大地

trans-unit.source: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from play, return that land to play.

trans-unit.source: The land will never betray those who gave their lives for it.
trans-unit.target: 土地永不背弃为其牺牲的人。

trans-unit.source: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."
trans-unit.target: 「农夫们为了我的利益干活。我准许。」

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."
trans-unit.target: 「农夫们为了我的利益干活。我准许。」
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Savannah Lions
trans-unit.target: 草原雄狮

trans-unit.source: Even the brave are scared by a lion three times: first by its tracks, again by its roar, and one last time face to face.\n—Somali proverb
trans-unit.target: 连勇士都会给狮子惊吓三次：先是其踪迹，接下来是其吼声，而面对面则是最后一次。\n～索马利谚语

trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: 贿赂

trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.
trans-unit.target: 在玛凯迪亚城，你的财势能延续多久，忠诚就能持续多久。

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Cowardice
trans-unit.target: 怯懦

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将该生物移回其拥有者手上。（此生物不会受到该咒语或异能的影响）

trans-unit.source: "Cowards die many times before their deaths;\nThe valiant never taste of death but once."\n—William Shakespeare, *Julius Caesar*
trans-unit.target: 「懦夫死过好多次；\n勇士衹死一次。」\n～威廉·莎士比亚，《凯撒大帝》

trans-unit.source: Cowardice
trans-unit.target: 怯懦
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Curiosity
trans-unit.target: 好奇

trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物向对手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "You know that secret? The one that wakes you up at night in a cold sweat? The one you think no one else in the world knows? Well, guess what."
trans-unit.target: 「你知道那个秘密？那个让你半夜惊醒、冷汗直流的秘密？那个你以为天下没别人晓得的秘密？嗯，猜猜看怎么了。」

trans-unit.source: Curiosity
trans-unit.target: 好奇

trans-unit.target: 大胆的学徒

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: "I've seen my master do this a hundred times. How hard can it be?"
trans-unit.target: 「我看我的师父做过几百次了。这哪有多难？」

trans-unit.target: 象牙塔中的学者唤他们为「空中鲨鱼」；老经验的旅者则完全不想招惹他们。

trans-unit.target: 隐身术

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

trans-unit.source: Mahamoti Djinn
trans-unit.target: 神灯巨灵

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.
trans-unit.target: 神灯巨灵乘著风的翅膀，拥有大气精怪中的高贵血统。身处赌场般危险的战场中，他是诡计与误导的专家。

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·90 | Merchant of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.
trans-unit.target: 为了在艾非托讨生活，法术师们沦为兜售谣传、流言、膺品，或是～如果他们豁出去了～事实。

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

彼处无尘俗羁绊她的飞翔
也没有阴影蒙蔽道路」
～托玛斯·摩尔，「假如我有翅膀」

trans-unit.target:
「但她穿越天际与白昼
直到所有牵挂之上
彼处无尘俗羁绊她的飞翔
也没有阴影蒙蔽道路」
～托玛斯·摩尔，「假如我有翅膀」
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·115 | Wrath of Marit Lage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of Marit Lage
trans-unit.target: 玛莉雷基之怒

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·115 | Wrath of Marit Lage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, tap all red creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，横置所有红色生物。

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·115 | Wrath of Marit Lage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 红色生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·115 | Wrath of Marit Lage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Marit Lage lies frozen in a glacier's heart. Still her dreams take form in our world, stealing the heat from our souls."\n—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest
trans-unit.target: 「玛莉雷基虽长埋于冰河深处，她的幻梦依旧在实界里具现，自灵魂窃取暖热。」\n～奇亚多朗僧侣哈渥·阿雷森

trans-unit.source: Zur's Weirding
trans-unit.target: 祖尔的奥秘

trans-unit.source: Players play with their hands revealed.
trans-unit.target: 牌手以展示手牌的方式进行对战。

trans-unit.source: If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws the card.
trans-unit.target: 若任何牌手将要抓一张牌时，改为将其展示之。然后其他任何牌手可以支付2点生命。若有牌手如此做，则将该牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场。若无人支付，则该牌手抓该张牌。

trans-unit.source: Zur's Weirding
trans-unit.target: 祖尔的奥秘

trans-unit.source: Coercion
trans-unit.target: 威迫

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.source: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

trans-unit.source: Dark Banishing
trans-unit.target: 暗境放逐

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.source:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say 'death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
—William Shakespeare, *Romeo and Juliet*
trans-unit.target:
「嘿，放逐？慈悲一点，判我死吧，
流放带著恐怖的面貌，
比死亡更教我畏惧。」
～威廉·莎士比亚，《罗蜜欧与茱丽叶》

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·125★ | Death Pits of Rath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits—that the *sudden* extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan."\n—Edgar Allan Poe,\n"The Pit and the Pendulum"
trans-unit.target: 「我也无法忘记关于这些深渊的记叙～生命突然灭绝的惨事，在他们可怕至极的计划中还不值一提。」\n～爱伦·坡，「陷阱与钟摆」
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。 此牌为和谐版本，画家为Greg Hildebrandt & Tim Hildebrandt。但MTGJSON未区分此牌闪卡版本的和谐版和非和谐版。

trans-unit.source: Deathgazer
trans-unit.target: 致命妖瞳

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡非黑色生物或被非黑色生物阻挡，在战斗结束时消灭该生物。

trans-unit.source: Your entire life passes before its eyes.
trans-unit.target: 你的一生在他眼前掠过。

trans-unit.source: Deathgazer
trans-unit.target: 致命妖瞳

trans-unit.source: Deepwood Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 深邃林食尸鬼

trans-unit.source: Pay 2 life: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 支付2点生命：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: They feed on the living to stay undead.
trans-unit.target: 他们以活人为食，以保持不死。

trans-unit.target: 深邃林食尸鬼

trans-unit.source: Diabolic Tutor
trans-unit.target: 恶魔导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.
trans-unit.target: 最好的点子常常出自最坏的心灵。

trans-unit.source: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."\n—Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*
trans-unit.target: 「死者可成为良好的士兵。它们不会违背命令，它们从不投降，它们也不会因为身上随便哪块部份掉下来就停止战斗。」\n～妮维亚洛，《死灵术士手册》
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。 此牌为和谐版本，画家为Arnie Swekel。但MTGJSON未区分此牌闪卡版本的和谐版和非和谐版。

trans-unit.source: Dusk Imp
trans-unit.target: 薄暮小恶魔

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.
trans-unit.target: 他鄙视人类、松鼠、野兽、矮人和𫠒人…对啦，他几近鄙视一切。

trans-unit.target: 薄暮小恶魔

trans-unit.source: Eastern Paladin
trans-unit.target: 东方神圣武士

trans-unit.source: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.
trans-unit.target: {B}{B}，{T}：消灭目标绿色生物。

trans-unit.source: "There is no worse enemy. His passion for death doesn't just border on insanity, it wallows in it."\n—Southern paladin
trans-unit.target: 「这是最棘手的敌人。他对死亡的热情程度不仅是濒临疯狂，根本是沉迷其中。」\n～南方神圣武士

trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

trans-unit.source: Giant Cockroach
trans-unit.target: 巨型蟑螂

trans-unit.source: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.
trans-unit.target: 陶伦的这大半辈子曾从许许多多的虫身上踩过；所以当一只虫居然从他身上踏过时，他不禁感到惊慌。

trans-unit.target: 巨型蟑螂

trans-unit.source: Gluttonous Zombie
trans-unit.target: 暴食灵俑

trans-unit.source: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 恐惧（此生物只能被神器和／或黑色生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.
trans-unit.target: 贪婪与暴食让他死亡。现在这是他最大的两样资产。

trans-unit.source: Grave Pact
trans-unit.target: 墓约

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, each other player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物从场上置入坟墓场时，其他每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: "The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."\n—Crovax, ascendant evincar
trans-unit.target: 「忠诚的束缚可以把人绑到坟墓里。」\n～天威大魔将寇维克斯

trans-unit.source: Gravedigger
trans-unit.target: 掘墓怪

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
trans-unit.target: 满载的棺木就像满载的宝库～两者都对贼有吸引力。

trans-unit.source:
"From the snowy slopes of Kaelor,
To the canyons of Bandu,
We drink and fight and feast and die
As we were born to do."

trans-unit.target:

到班度的峡谷，
我们痛饮、战斗、庆贺、死亡
如同我们的天赋。」

trans-unit.source: Foolishly, Najib retreated to his castle at El-Abar; the next morning he was dead. In just one night, the dwarven forces had reduced the mighty walls to mere rubble.

trans-unit.source: Bent on a quest for blood, a giant can storm through a fort's wall as if it were nothing more than a picket fence.
trans-unit.target: 因嗜血欲望而癫狂的巨人，能把要塞坚壁当成步哨木墙般地闯过。

trans-unit.source: Hill Giant
trans-unit.target: 山丘巨人
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Hulking Cyclops
trans-unit.target: 笨拙独眼巨人

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.
trans-unit.target: 谁都可以在独眼巨人附近徘徊，可是很少有人能挡它的路。

trans-unit.source: Inferno
trans-unit.target: 炼狱

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物与每位牌手各造成6点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."\n—Jaya Ballard, task mage
trans-unit.target: 「曾有人说破坏没什么巧妙之处。你知道吗？他们死啦。」\n～特务巫师雅亚·巴拉德

trans-unit.source: Lesser Gargadon
trans-unit.target: 小型乳齿巨象

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进行攻击或阻挡时，牺牲一个地。

trans-unit.source: "In some cultures, elephants are ridden by those in power. I don't think a mere elephant would even be noticed in Keld."\n—Onean sergeant
trans-unit.target: 「某些文化的掌权者用象当座骑。但普通的象在凯尔顿实在不够引人注目。」\n～欧尼亚士官

trans-unit.source: Mana Clash
trans-unit.target: 法术力碰撞

trans-unit.source: You and target opponent each flip a coin. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.
trans-unit.target: 你和目标对手各掷一枚硬币，CARDNAME对每位掷出反面的牌手各造成1点伤害。重复此步骤，直到双方的硬币同时出现正面为止。

trans-unit.target: 每当任何对手使用咒语时，CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 受主子魔力折磨的莫葛，会因法术的气息而暴跳如雷。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be countered.

trans-unit.source: Orcish Artillery
trans-unit.target: 半兽人的大炮

trans-unit.source: {T}: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害，并且对你造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "So they want to kill my men? Well two can play at that game."\n—General Khurzog
trans-unit.target: 「他们想宰我的部下？找两个人陪他们玩玩。」\n～喀左格将军

trans-unit.source: Orcish Spy
trans-unit.target: 半兽人间谍

trans-unit.source: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. (Put them back in the same order.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：检视目标牌手牌库顶的三张牌。（将它们以相同顺序放回。）

trans-unit.source: "You idiot! Never let the spies mingle with the orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight!"\n—General Khurzog
trans-unit.target: 「你这笨蛋！每次任务完成后，绝对不可以让探子与半兽人正规兵混成一堆。这下子可叫不动他们去打仗了！」\n～喀左格将军

trans-unit.source: Orcish Spy
trans-unit.target: 半兽人间谍
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：检视目标牌手牌库顶的三张牌。（将它们以相同顺序放回。）
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: "You idiot! Never let the spies mingle with the orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight!"\n—General Khurzog
trans-unit.target: 「你这笨蛋！每次任务完成后，绝对不可以让探子与半兽人正规兵混成一堆。这下子可叫不动他们去打仗了！」\n～喀左格将军
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Rukh Egg

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, put a 4/4 red Rukh creature token with flying into play at end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

trans-unit.source: Set aside all cards in play. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the cards set aside and puts it into play tapped under his or her control. Repeat this process until all those cards have been chosen.
trans-unit.target: 将场上所有牌放到旁边。由你开始，每位牌手各从这些牌中选择一张，并在其操控下横置进场。重复此过程，直到这些牌都被选完为止。

trans-unit.source: Wall of Stone
trans-unit.target: 石墙

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·232 | Wall of Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）

trans-unit.source: The ground itself lends its strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.
trans-unit.target: 大地亲手将生命借与活石之墙，使之保有远古山脉般的稳定性。这些雄伟的堡垒阻挠了地面部队，使守护此大地的战士们，在疲劳时有了栖息之处。

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Canopy Spider
trans-unit.target: 林冠蜘蛛

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may block as though it had flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME可以视同具有飞行异能地进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.
trans-unit.target: 他排除掉森林高处的任何威胁…除了蜘蛛本身。

trans-unit.source: Craw Wurm
trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙

trans-unit.source: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.
trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙最可怕之处，大概便是他高速冲过森林时所造成的恐怖声响了。那巨大的声响在树间回荡不歇，有如同时从四面八方而来。

trans-unit.source: Craw Wurm
trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙

trans-unit.source: Creeping Mold

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器、结界或地。

trans-unit.source: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.
trans-unit.target: 腐霉爬过那道墙，侵入每处缝隙，直到那白净的岩石支撑不住而爆裂。

trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool.

trans-unit.target: 「大自然的爱…是激烈，灼热，具现的贪婪…」\n～玛丽·韦勃，《多莫树林中的屋子》

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Five hundred years to grow—barely a minute to eat.
trans-unit.target: 长了五百年，一分钟吃光。
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Fungusaur
trans-unit.target: 真菌兽

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (The damage is dealt before the counter is put on.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。（先受到伤害，然后才放置指示物）

trans-unit.source: Rather than sheltering her young, the female fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.
trans-unit.target: 母真菌兽常伤害而非呵护其幼代，以使他们快速成长。

trans-unit.source: Grizzly Bears
trans-unit.target: 灰棕熊

trans-unit.source: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.
trans-unit.target: 莫尝试与多明尼亚的灰棕熊赛跑，它会抓住你、弄倒你，并吃掉你。当然，你也可以逃上树，如此一来，在他弄倒树并吃掉你前，你还能欣赏一阵子风景。

trans-unit.source: Grizzly Bears
trans-unit.target: 灰棕熊

trans-unit.source: Lhurgoyf
trans-unit.target: 拉高耶夫

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量等同于所有坟墓场内生物牌的数量，其防御力等同于前述的数量加1。

trans-unit.source: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the lhurgoyf!"\n—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words
trans-unit.target: 「啊！汉斯，快跑！拉高耶夫来了！」\n～莎妃·艾力克斯朵特，遗言

trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: "I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now *that's* a plan!"\n—Wandering mage
trans-unit.target: 「孩子，我不会待在那亚龙前面。当然我也不会待在他后面。事实上呢，待在那亚龙身旁不是明智之举，快跑才是上策！」\n～流浪法师

trans-unit.source: Spined Wurm
trans-unit.target: 刺棘亚龙

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一种生物类别。
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，展示你牌库顶的四张牌。将所有以此法展示，且为该类别的生物牌置于你手上，并将其余的牌置于你的牌库底。
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 该类别的生物得+1/+1。
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Coat of Arms
trans-unit.target: 武装外衣

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·294 | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play that shares a creature type with it. (For example, if there are three Goblins in play, each gets +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，场上每有一个具共通之生物类别的其他生物，它便得+1/+1。（例如，若有三个精灵在场上，则它们各得+2/+2）

trans-unit.source: "Hup, two, three, four,\nDunno how to count no more."\n—Mogg march
trans-unit.target: 「哈，二，三，四，\n我们不会往下数。」\n～莫葛行军口令

trans-unit.source: Coat of Arms
trans-unit.target: 武装外衣
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·294★ | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，场上每有一个具共通之生物类别的其他生物，它便得+1/+1。（例如，若有三个精灵在场上，则它们各得+2/+2）
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: "Hup, two, three, four,\nDunno how to count no more."\n—Mogg march
trans-unit.target: 「哈，二，三，四，\n我们不会往下数。」\n～莫葛行军口令
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Crystal Rod
trans-unit.target: 水晶棒

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用蓝色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此做，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Polished by a thousand waves.
trans-unit.target: 以千百道波浪磨亮。

trans-unit.source: Defense Grid
trans-unit.target: 阻御网

trans-unit.source: During each player's turn, each other player's spells cost {3} more to play.
trans-unit.target: 于每位牌手的回合中，其他牌手使用的咒语费用增加{3}来使用。

trans-unit.source: "A good deal of tyranny goes by the name of protection."\n—Crystal Eastman, "Equality or Protection"
trans-unit.target: 「许多暴政假保护之名而行。」\n～克里斯朵·伊斯曼，\n「平等或保护」

trans-unit.source: Dingus Egg
trans-unit.target: 爆地蛋

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个地从场上置入坟墓场时，CARDNAME对该地的操控者造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.
trans-unit.target: 传说中，世界是从一颗蛋孵化而成。

trans-unit.target: 爆地蛋

trans-unit.target: 扰乱权杖

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card from his or her hand. Play this ability only during your turn.

trans-unit.source: "True power is controlling not only the hearts of your subjects, but their minds as well."
trans-unit.target: 「真正的权力不只是控制你臣民的心灵，还要控制他们的理智。」

trans-unit.source: Howling Mine

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if CARDNAME is untapped, that player draws a card.

trans-unit.source: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.
trans-unit.target: 传说中，那矿井会嘶吼著死在其中者的临终话语。

trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.
trans-unit.target: 那石轮日夜不息的转动，发出可怖的声音，许多法师都被那声音逼得发狂。

trans-unit.source: Millstone
trans-unit.target: 研磨石轮

trans-unit.source: Patagia Golem
trans-unit.target: 翼翅魔像

trans-unit.source: {3}: CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: {3}：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）

trans-unit.source: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.
trans-unit.target: 它的翅膀在原设计中仅用以装饰，但它自行学会其用法。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Hulk
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚巨汉

trans-unit.source:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
—Onean children's rhyme
trans-unit.target:
它没思想。它没感觉。
它不会笑也不会哭。
从晚到早所做的
就是让士兵阵亡。
～欧尼亚童谣

trans-unit.source: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: These devices have been known to pull entire worlds through the Æther.
trans-unit.target: 已知这些设备能将整个世界穿越乙太拉过来。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color a basic land you control could produce.

trans-unit.source: It doesn't point north. It points home.
trans-unit.target: 它并不指引北方。它指引著家乡。

trans-unit.source: Teferi's Puzzle Box
trans-unit.target: 泰菲力的魔术方块

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·316 | Teferi's Puzzle Box | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards. (That player draws his or her card for the turn first.)
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手将其手牌以任意次序置于其牌库底，然后抓等量的牌。（该牌手先抓本回合应抓的牌。）

trans-unit.target: 克撒之铠

trans-unit.source: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
trans-unit.target: 若任何来源将对你造成伤害，则防止该伤害中的1点。

trans-unit.source: Urza protected his body well, but neglected his soul.
trans-unit.target: 克撒的身体防护妥当无比，却疏忽了灵魂的防护。

trans-unit.source: Vexing Arcanix
trans-unit.target: 艾卡尼思乱心具

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and CARDNAME deals 2 damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：目标牌手说出一个牌名，然后展示其牌库顶牌。若该牌的名称是你所说的名称，则该牌手将该牌置于其手上。若不是，则该牌手将该牌置入其坟墓场，并且CARDNAME对他造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Vexing Arcanix
trans-unit.target: 艾卡尼思乱心具
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their graveyard and CARDNAME deals 2 damage to them.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：目标牌手说出一个牌名，然后展示其牌库顶牌。若该牌的名称是你所说的名称，则该牌手将该牌置于其手上。若不是，则该牌手将该牌置入其坟墓场，并且CARDNAME对他造成2点伤害。
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Wall of Spears
trans-unit.target: 长矛之墙

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·320 | Wall of Spears | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）

trans-unit.resname: 8ED·320 | Wall of Spears | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."\n—Onean sergeant
trans-unit.target: 「长棍是你的伙伴，有尖端的长棍是你的好伙伴。配有尖长棍的军队，是你的最佳伙伴。」\n～欧尼亚士官

trans-unit.source: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."\n—Onean sergeant
trans-unit.target: 「长棍是你的伙伴，有尖端的长棍是你的好伙伴。配有尖长棍的军队，是你的最佳伙伴。」\n～欧尼亚士官
trans-unit.note: 第七版开始，核心系列开始印刷闪卡，且闪卡是黑边而非平卡的白边，因此MTGJSON将闪卡和平卡分为两张不同的牌。

trans-unit.source: Wooden Sphere
trans-unit.target: 木制法球

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当有牌手使用绿色咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此做，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.
trans-unit.target: 以千百束枝条强固。
